title: (x) Hand drawn shaded 3D "XV Años" - Santo Domingo (FUSE) {Emmanuel}
content:
Hello,

I’m looking for this font’s name.

Thank you for advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [f.png](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=f.png) | 7.41 KB |
author: husuario

comments.content: Just in case we don’t find the actual font: this is based on Franklin Gothic. If you want to approximate this all you have to do is trace the characters and add the 3D effect.
BTW I already looked through a pretty substantial number of shadow and 3D fonts and came up with nothing. It does ring a bell though, so give us a bit of time.

Good alternative Philippe. Is there any evidence that this sample is not simply a set of hand-drawn letters (are there more letters?).

BTW, Philippe, thanks for showing me how to open the URL in a new page. The ‘formatting guidelines and options’ didn’t cover this. I liked the previous “\newurl{” better, but at least now I know how to do it.

- Mike Yanega

This font is SANTO DOMINGO (FUSE)

http://www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=virtual.content&area=sf\_products&content=/virtual/fssf/products/fuse13.htm  
(bottom of the page)
Excellent. Did you have super skills? Thank you Manukball.
